press.headline: North Beach’s Development Boom Gains Momentum With New Residential and Mixed-Use Projects
press.excerpt: North Beach, a historically low-rise and quiet section of Miami Beach, is undergoing a wave of redevelopment as developers capitalize on new zoning incentives and increasing demand for housing.

press.headline: Developer opens first of four planned condominiums in Miami Beach
press.excerpt: Lefferts, a real estate development firm led by Mendy Chudaitov, has opened 72 Park in Miami Beach’s North Beach neighborhood, becoming the first of four condo projects planned for the area by the Miami Beach- and New York-based developer.

press.headline: Mapped: New projects could redefine Miami Beach's north end
press.excerpt: North Beach is undergoing a major development boom as planned luxury projects promise to redefine Miami Beach's north end. Why it matters: New development can bring the kind of investment city leaders have long wanted for North Beach, but luxury redevelopment won't help Miami's affordability crisis and could shutter local shops.

press.headline: Story Spaces
press.excerpt: Miami-based interior architect Ruby Ramirez brings playful zest to the projects she designs throughout South Florida and around the world.
